europeana:record.dc:title: Valgine beetles : a preliminary review of the genera, with descriptions of two novelties
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Krikken J.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
europeana:record.dc:description: Heterovalgus popei (Java) and Tibiovalgus perplexus (Cameroun), new genera and species, are described and inserted in a key to the known genera of Valginae. A checklist of valgine genus-group names is given, including details about type-species, synonymies, number of species per genus, and occurrence in zoogeographical regions. For six old genus-group names type-species are designated.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Valgine beetles : a preliminary review of the genera, with descriptions of two novelties (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 53) (Issue 15)
